comments:
To reproduce:
=============
1. create a java project in your workspace
2. open the New web service client wizard
3. In the service definition field, put in a wsdl url, such as
   http://www.xmethods.net/sd/2001/TemperatureService.wsdl
4. Select the project created in step 1 as the target project
5. Move the slider all the way up to "Test"
6. Click Finish.

You'll get the following exception in a pop-up dialog box:

IWAB0014E Unexpected exception occured.
